name: Bring out your dead
description:
A short game inspired by Monty Python and the nerdflu epidemic that affected attendees of the GodotCon Poznań 2019, including this game's authors :)

Use Left and Right arrows (or A and D) to move the cart (once the intro has played).

Collect and dump corpses with the Space bar.

When no more corpses are spawning, you lost :)

Made in 3 hours for Trijam #41 with Godot Engine 3.2 alpha 2, by Ilaria Cislaghi, Fabio Alessandrelli and Rémi Verschelde.

Published under the MIT license, source code at https://gitlab.com/QbieShay/bring-out-your-dead

Thirdparty assets:

assets/churchbell.wav: CC-BY-SA 3.0, Ulrich Metzner & qubodup
assets/gaslamp_funworks.ogg: CC-BY 3.0, Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
assets/FiraSans-Regular.ttf: SIL Open Font License 1.1, The Mozilla Foundation and Telefonica S.A.

Derivative work from Godot Engine icon, CC-BY 3.0, Andrea Calabró
